title: Fool-proof rib of beef
ingredients: ['Roast', '1 (2.5kg) rib of beef, trimmed of fat', '2 1/2 teaspoons coarse sea salt, divided', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '1/2 teaspoon fennel seeds, crushed', '1kg small potatoes, halved', '1 onion, cut into thin wedges', 'Dipping sauce', '120g soured cream', '3 tablespoons horseradish', '1 tablespoon snipped fresh chives']
